parameters.content: # Scenario D: New Organization + New Person
# Scenario C: New Organization + Existing Person
# Scenario B: Existing Organization + New Person
# Scenario A: Existing Organization + Existing Person
# Phase 1: Form Submission Trigger

### What you do:
Complete the contact form on the website with your business information
Provide required details including name, company, email, phone, website URL, and message
Submit the form to initiate the automated lead processing

### What the system does:
Receives form data via Webflow webhook trigger (adaptable to other form platforms)
Captures all submitted information including contact details and business context
Initiates the automated lead processing workflow immediately
Prepares data for CRM integration and intelligent routing

### Result:
‚úÖ Lead data captured automatically from any form platform
‚úÖ Immediate workflow activation upon form submission
‚úÖ All contact information secured and ready for processing
‚úÖ No manual data entry required for lead management
# Phase 2: Data Processing and Phone Number Formatting

### What the system does:
Extracts and cleans all form field data into standardized format
Processes phone numbers intelligently using advanced international formatting
Detects country codes automatically from phone number patterns
Formats phone numbers with proper international prefixes (+33, +1, +44, etc.)
Handles multiple international formats including French, European, and global numbers
Applies fallback formatting for unrecognized number patterns

### Result:
‚úÖ Clean, standardized contact data ready for CRM integration
‚úÖ International phone numbers properly formatted for WhatsApp messaging
‚úÖ Consistent data quality across all lead records
‚úÖ Automatic handling of various phone number formats
# Phase 3: Organization Discovery and Management

### What the system does:
Searches existing CRM (Pipedrive) for the company name
Uses exact matching to identify existing organizations
Routes workflow based on organization existence
Creates new organization if none exists with matching name

# Searches for the person within the known organization
# Links existing records for deal creation
# Maintains data consistency across related records

# Creates new person record linked to existing organization
# Preserves organizational relationships and history
# Adds new contact to established company structure

# Creates new organization for the company
# Links existing person to new organization structure
# Handles cases where person exists but company is new

# Creates both organization and person records from scratch
# Establishes complete new relationship in CRM
# Sets up full contact and company structure
# Phase 4: Person Record Management

### What the system does:
Searches for existing persons by full name within relevant organization
Creates new person records when no match is found
Updates existing records with new information when person exists
Associates persons with correct organizations automatically
Maintains custom properties including lead source tracking
Adds formatted phone numbers and email addresses

### Result:
‚úÖ Accurate person record management without duplicates
‚úÖ Complete contact information captured and updated
‚úÖ Proper organizational relationships maintained
‚úÖ Lead source tracking for attribution analysis
# Phase 5: Lead Communication and Engagement Management

### What the system does:
Analyzes form submission for additional context including messages and website URLs
Creates comprehensive notes attached to deals preserving all submitted information
Adds website URL references for business context and competitive research
Sends formatted notifications to Discord sales channel with complete lead details
Provides immediate team alerts for new prospect activity and coordination
Delivers personalized WhatsApp messages to leads using properly formatted phone numbers
Sends welcome messages acknowledging inquiries and setting follow-up expectations
Uses personalized messaging with lead's actual name for enhanced engagement
Maintains professional communication standards across all channels

### Result:
‚úÖ Complete lead context and intelligence preserved in CRM system
‚úÖ Instant team awareness with structured information sharing
‚úÖ Immediate, personalized response to every lead inquiry
‚úÖ Professional first impression via modern messaging channels
‚úÖ Sales team has access to original inquiry details and website information
‚úÖ Collaborative lead qualification process enabled across team
‚úÖ Clear expectations set for Customer Success Manager follow-up
‚úÖ Enhanced lead engagement and response rates through multi-channel approach
‚úÖ Fast response time capability maintaining competitive advantage
